summary: PULLING A GOOSENECK TRAILER WITH MODERATE LOAD DESCENDING A MOUNTAIN PASS, WHEN APPLIED BRAKES, FRONT END WENT INTO THE DEATH WOBBLE AND HAD TO COME TO A NEAR STOP. IN HEAVY TRAFFIC ON LEVEL TERRAIN WHILE BRAKING THE SAME THING HAPPENS AND HAD TO COME TO A NEAR STOP. AFTER UNLOADING ,I TRIED THE SAME BRAKING ON LEVEL TERRAIN AND HAD NO PROBLEM. AFTER UNHOOKING THE TRAILER I TRIED THE SAME BRAKING SCENARIO AND HAD NO PROBLEM.  THE VEHICLE IS UNSAFE TO DRIVE HAULING A LOAD ,WHICH THE VEHICLE I DESIGNED FOR
